name: Macman
overview: Macman: A single screen maze game viewed from above based on the arcade game Pac Man where you have to eat all the dots in the maze to move to the next level. As you eat the dots, there are three ghosts also moving around the maze and these have to be avoided because if you touch one then you lose one of three lives. In each corner are power-pills and when eaten allow you to eat the ghosts for a short period of time.
